questions.question: You needn’t have brought …………………. that topic again.
questions.description: To bring up a topic is to mention it.

questions.question: If you didn’t get the right answer, you should do the sum …………………….
questions.description: To do over is to do again.

questions.question: Here is my glass. Please fill it ……………………
I don’t want to be friends with anyone who says nasty things about me behind my …………………….
The chief guest gave ……………………….. the prices.
questions.description: To give away is to distribute.

questions.question: You had better give me my money …………………………
questions.description: To give money back is to repay.

questions.question: It is very cold. Put your coat …………………..
questions.description: To put on a coat is to wear it.

questions.question: The firemen worked hard to put the fire ………………………….
questions.description: To put out fire is to extinguish it.

questions.question: Please take ………………………. my number.
questions.description: To take down is to write down.

questions.question: Once you have finished playing, put the toys …………………….
questions.description: To put something away is to put it in the proper place after use.

questions.question: I don’t know why they turned ……………………… my application.
questions.description: To turn down is to reject.

questions.question: His grandmother passed …………………… in July.
questions.description: To pass away is to die.
